creator: sander@temme.net
text:
Compiling on a Solaris 10/x86 box (helios) with OpenSSL installed in /usr/sfw. The httpd-2.0.55 
configure correctly finds this openssl, but the httpd-2.2.0 configure doesn't and needs to have it pointed 
out with --with-ssl=/usr/sfw. Haven't tested trunk. Haven't tested other platforms (the usual suspects 
have OpenSSL in the usual places so it's no fun). Will attempt to hunt down difference in configure foo and 
advice.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
There's no real difference between 2.0 and 2.2/trunk here, it's expected
behaviour that the libraries in a non-system path won't be found.
